statements: SELECT * FROM ElectionResults WHERE party_affiliation = 'Independent';
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes FROM ElectionResults WHERE total_votes > 1000 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, vote_percentage FROM ElectionResults WHERE vote_percentage > 20;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults ORDER BY candidate_name ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation FROM ElectionResults WHERE total_votes < 500;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults WHERE total_votes > 100 ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, total_votes FROM ElectionResults WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democrats' ORDER BY total_votes ASC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, vote_percentage FROM ElectionResults WHERE vote_percentage >= 10 AND party_affiliation = 'Republicans';
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes, party_affiliation FROM ElectionResults WHERE total_votes > 5000 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes, vote_percentage FROM ElectionResults WHERE vote_percentage BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, votes FROM election_results WHERE votes > 1000;
SELECT voter_id, age, gender FROM voter_details WHERE age > 18;
SELECT voter_name FROM voter_details ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_candidates FROM election_results;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE votes > 100 ORDER BY votes DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT candidate_name, SUM(votes) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name HAVING SUM(votes) > 500 ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, COUNT(votes) AS vote_count FROM election_results GROUP BY candidate_name ORDER BY vote_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE candidate_name = 'John Doe' AND votes > 50 ORDER BY votes DESC;
SELECT voter_name, age, gender FROM voter_details WHERE age BETWEEN 18 AND 30 ORDER BY age DESC, voter_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM election_results;
SELECT candidate_name, votes_received FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT party_affiliation, SUM(votes_received) AS total_votes FROM election_results GROUP BY party_affiliation;
SELECT * FROM voter_turnout WHERE voter_turnout_percentage > 70;
SELECT precinct_name, total_registered_voters FROM voting_precincts ORDER BY total_registered_voters DESC;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election_results WHERE votes_received > 100
SELECT * FROM election_results WHERE party_affiliation = 'Independent'
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election_results ORDER BY votes_received DESC
SELECT precinct_name, total_registered_voters FROM voting_precincts WHERE total_registered_voters > 5000
SELECT precinct_name, votes_cast, voter_turnout_percentage FROM voting_precincts JOIN voter_turnout ON voting_precincts.precinct_id = voter_turnout.precinct_id
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT election_name, total_votes FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_date = '2022-11-15';
SELECT candidate_name, total_votes_received FROM Candidate ORDER BY total_votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM Voter WHERE voter_age > 30 AND voter_location = 'New York';
SELECT district_name, total_registered_voters FROM ElectionDistrict WHERE total_registered_voters > 5000 ORDER BY total_registered_voters DESC;
SELECT * FROM ElectionResults;
SELECT election_name, total_votes FROM ElectionResults WHERE election_date = '2022-11-10';
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, total_votes_received FROM Candidate ORDER BY total_votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM Voter WHERE voter_age > 18 AND voter_location = 'New York';
SELECT district_name, total_registered_voters FROM ElectionDistrict WHERE district_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM election;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM election WHERE party_affiliation = 'Democratic';
SELECT * FROM precinct ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT voter_name, age, precinct_name FROM voter JOIN precinct ON voter.precinct_id = precinct.id;
SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM candidate WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' ORDER BY votes_received DESC;
SELECT * FROM election WHERE votes_received > 1000 ORDER BY votes_received DESC, election_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT voter_name, age, precinct_name FROM voter INNER JOIN precinct ON voter.precinct_id = precinct.id WHERE age >= 18 AND total_votes > 500 ORDER BY age DESC, total_votes DESC

SELECT candidate_name, party_affiliation, votes_received FROM candidate INNER JOIN election ON candidate.election_id = election.id WHERE party_affiliation = 'Republican' AND votes_received < 500 ORDER BY votes_received ASC

SELECT ballot.id, voter.voter_name, candidate.candidate_name FROM ballot LEFT JOIN voter ON ballot.voter_id = voter.id LEFT JOIN candidate ON ballot.candidate_id = candidate.id WHERE vote_status = 'accepted' ORDER BY ballot.id ASC
SELECT * FROM election WHERE election_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY election_date DESC, votes_received DESC LIMIT 3
